column2: BRIEF-MSA Safety's Board Appoints Nishan Vartanian As CEO May 15 (Reuters) - MSA Safety Inc: * MSA BOARD ELECTS NISHAN J. VARTANIAN CEO OF MSA SAFETY; WILLIAM M. LAMBERT ELECTED NON-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
